text: @joelockhart Fox News should be ashamed of themselves.  To make light of this coronavirus is totally unacceptable.  Especially Devin Nunes’ deliberately lying about this virus and Fox just keeps putting people on that refuse to admit how serious this virus is.  Just unbelievable.
